title: 服务器崩了……求大神解决啊，本人小白……
author: pohun
txt_content:
昨天租借的服务器的供应商网络出现了问题……今天早晨才好……然后开服没法开……
出现      
21.12 10:39:37 [Multicraft] Server stopped      #21.12 10:39:37 [Multicraft] 服务器停止
21.12 10:39:37 [Multicraft] Received stop command   #21.12 10:39:37 [Multicraft] 接收到的停止命令
21.12 10:39:35 [Multicraft] Server stopped    #21.12 10:39:35 [Multicraft] 服务器停止
21.12 10:39:35 [Multicraft] Server shut down  # #21.12 10:39:35 [Multicraft] 服务器停止
21.12 10:39:33 [Server] INFO 2014-12-21 10:39:33,281 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream  #看不懂……
21.12 10:39:33 [Server] INFO 2014-12-21 10:39:33,281 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
21.12 10:39:31 [Server] INFO 2014-12-21 10:39:31,438 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
21.12 10:39:23 [Server] INFO 2014-12-21 10:39:23,172 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream
21.12 10:39:23 [Server] INFO 2014-12-21 10:39:23,172 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fuse

求如何解决

replies.author: tyhppp
